org.rlcommunity.rlviz.dynamicloading
Class ClassExtractor

java.lang.Object
  org.rlcommunity.rlviz.dynamicloading.ClassExtractor

public class ClassExtractor
extends java.lang.Object

Given a grabber that returns Jars, this will find all of the classes in it that match certain criteria.

Author:
mradkie

getAllClassesThatImplement

public java.util.Vector<ClassSourcePair> getAllClassesThatImplement(java.util.Vector<java.lang.Class<?>> toMatch,
                                                                    java.util.Vector<java.lang.Class<?>> toExclude)
getAllClassesThatImplement stands for get All Classes That Implement. This method checks all Jars in theJardDir for classes that implement toMatch.

Parameters:
theJarDir -
toMatch -
Returns:
a vector of classes that implement toMatch found in theJarDir

checkIfDescendantOf

public boolean checkIfDescendantOf(java.lang.Class<?> sourceClass,
                                   java.util.Vector<java.lang.Class<?>> toMatch,
                                   java.util.Vector<java.lang.Class<?>> toExclude)
This Method calls getInterfaceNames to get a list of all interfaces implemented by thisEntry. If this set of interfaceNames contains toMatch.getname() (the name of the interface to see of thisEntry implements) true is returned, otherwise false.

Parameters:
thisEntry - - the class file we wish to check
theURL - - the jar file the class file is located in
toMatch - - the interface we want to check if thisEntry implements+
Returns:

sourceClass -

This method loads a class (thisEntry) from a jar file (theURL)

Parameters:
thisEntry - - the class file to load
theURL - - the jar file to load it from
Returns:
